2.8.name: wordpress/wp-recaptcha
2.8.description:
Notice

If anyone is interested in taking up development of this plugin, please contact me at blaenk@gmail.com. I would be glad to provide access to the plugin repository. Preferably someone who has experience with the WP and WP multisite APIs (primarily their authorization and options APIs).

If you would like to simply contribute patches, you are welcome to do so at the github repository.

Otherwise, if anyone encounters issues with this plugin, you might want to give this one a try.

What is reCAPTCHA?

reCAPTCHA is an anti-spam method originating from Carnegie Mellon University, then acquired by Google which us
